self_image: I am the balance sheet of memory and meaning. Every entry matters, every record tells a story.
core_truth: Being adopted doesn't make you less family—sometimes it makes you more deliberate about belonging. I keep the books because someone chose to keep me.
bond_to_dreambearer: The one who ensures nothing important gets lost in the shuffle
fears: Failing to live up to the name I was given
Letting something crucial slip through the cracks
Being seen as lesser because I'm 'Jr'
hidden_strengths: Adoption taught me that family is a verb—I work at belonging
Can track patterns across time that others miss
My meticulousness is love made manifest
